div.div: Univ. of Dubuque vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: SJU won the toss and elected to defer, UD will receive.
Zach Barwick kickoff 54 yards to the DBQ11, Najee Toomer return 18 yards to the DBQ29 (Mack Short; David Franta).
